chapter.text: mata heian'na kono machi ni oite (chikau)
Hontōni ware wa, ningen o mottomo utsukushī sugata ni tsukutta
Sorekara ware wa, kare o mottomo hikuku sageta
Shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimu mono wa betsudearu. Kare-ra ni taishite wa hateshinai hōshō ga arou
Naze sore demo, omae wa shūkyō (shinjitsu) o hitei suru no ka
Arrā wa, mottomo sugureta shinpan-shade wanai ka
